Name: Lost Scale: Part One
About the game: Lost Scale: Part One is a top-down shooter game made in 2D graphics. This is a hardcore, bloody top-down shooter in which you have to overcome crowds of opponents and hold out for a certain time, which will help you with the loot that appears. Scene: Once, on a warm evening, the reptile Rappie was walking with her pet Stripe. Suddenly a disaster struck: the pet fell underground into the Deadshell caves. Find Stripe, get out of trouble and solve the riddle of a new world dominated by humanoid reptiles.
Meta Title: Lost Scale: Part One: May 17, 2021, Danicy and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Lost Scale: Part One? Check out the release date (May 17, 2021), developer insights from Danicy, and a complete game summary.
